abstract: This template is an example of enabling collaboration at a team level.  It has many parts including news, files, and team calendar.

properties.name: SiteTitle
properties.caption: Site Title
properties.description: Title for your site and Office 365 Group

properties.name: SiteAlias
properties.caption: Site Alias
properties.description: The alias for the O365 Group to create. The site URL will be /sites/<alias> or /teams/<alias> depending on your Tenant settings.
